title: The Best Ways to Win Eras Tour Tickets

steps.content: If you can tell iHeartRadio why you want to see Taylor Swift in 25 words or less, you could win a chance to do just that! For this contest, all you have to do is answer the question “Why do you need to win Taylor Swift tickets?” in 25 words. The contest ends on February 13, 2024. Two winners will be selected to attend The Eras Tour at Melbourne Cricket Ground in Australia or Accor Stadium in Sydney.

Get the chance to see Taylor Swift in Toronto, Canada, on November 23, 2024, by being a loyal customer of Bathorium. For this sweepstake, there are multiple ways to enter—the more things you do, the more chances you have to win. Complete the items below by February 28, 2024, to see if your wildest dreams will come true: Make a purchase at Bathorium of $125 or more. Sign up for Bathorium’s TubClub emails. Follow Bathorium on Instagram. Comment on Bathorium’s Eras Tour Instagram post. Refer a friend to the sweepstakes.

Enter your email address for a chance to win 2 tickets to The Eras Tour on October 25, 2024 through Louisiana’s top radio stations. It’s free to enter! Simply type in your email (or sign up with your Facebook account), name, and phone number to submit your entry. Who knows? You may just be the one!

The United Cerebral Palsy of Mobile is hosting a ticket raffle that could give you the chance to win 2 tickets to The Eras Tour in New Orleans on Sunday, October 27, 2024. Raffle tickets are $40, and you must be 18 years or older to participate. All proceeds from the raffle will benefit UCP’s mission to help children and adults with disabilities. Long story short, helping others may help you be the lucky one.

When you purchase a raffle ticket to support the Children’s Hospital of New Orleans, you’ll be entered for a chance to win 4 enchanting tickets to The Eras Tour in New Orleans, Louisiana, on Saturday, October 26, 2024. Raffle tickets are $200 and can be purchased until March 11, 2024. All proceeds will help fund the hospital’s new Pediatrics Stem Cell Transplant Unit, and participants must be 21 years old or older to enter.

Get the chance to see Taylor Swift in London on August 19, 2024, by donating to the Colorado Music Festival and Center for Musical Arts. Give at least a $25 donation for a chance to win 4 tickets to the concert, 4 nights at the Grosvenor House Hotel on London’s Park Lane, limousine transportation, and a $4,000 travel stipend. The winner of this sweepstakes will surely be living the cruel summer of their dreams!

If you become a Marriott Bonvoy member, you’ll be entered in a sweepstake to win tickets for a chance to see Taylor Swift across the globe. All you have to do is join Marriott Bonvoy’s reward program (it’s free!) and enter for a chance to win. Who knows? We may see you dressed to the nines in your most bejeweled outfit at the next show!

Looking for even more chances to win Taylor Swift tickets? We get it! The hype behind this concert is real, and we want you to win the great war and be able to experience it. To find more chances to win (or to look for ticket sweepstakes for specific cities), search “taylor swift eras tour ticket giveaway [name of city]” online. Check out Taylor’s official tour schedule to see what cities The Eras Tour is stopping next.
